title: Question about climbing
body: a week+ ago I demoted from silver 2 to silver 3 and ended up taking a break from ranked, today I played 4 ranked games and got back to silver 2 0-LP, if I lose a game do I demote again or same thing I don't demote right away for a few games?

replies.body: It's pretty random i guess. Or depending on your mmr. I just lost 5 games at 0 lp at silver 3 and i dind't get demoted (thank god). If you look at my match history you'll see i got a 7 win strake, and below that a 5 lose streak. With those 7 wins i got from silver 3 0 lp to silver 2 0lp

As long as you don't lose around 3 games at 0 LP you should be fine.

Keep it up ;)
